A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The story and screenplay is messy\, convoluted\, lazy\, nonsensical and  poorly written. The filmmaker ignored and contradict setups from previous films. There are blatant editing mistakes. The film waste too much time with the slow chase sequences\, miscommunication for drama\, establishing bland new characters. The themes and forced messages was preachy\, hypocritical and dreadful. The movie wants to deconstruct and destroy what came before instead of honoring and building upon it.
